review.reviewBody: Best pizza in town! Always fresh and always delicious. The Margherita, Prosciutto Arugula, Napoletana and Oceanside pizzas are superb. The salads, appies & desserts are amazing also.
Very disappointing..boring and tasteless meatlover pizza..never buy there again...overhyped overpriced.. 1 star
Have ordered from this restaurant many times. Never disappointed. I ordered The southern style BBQ chicken this time and it tastes very good.
Worst excuse for a  "neapolitan" I've ever had. So much cheap, greasy cheese. If that's what I wanted, I would have ordered pizza hut. Don't call this authentic neapolitan pizza! Awful!
So crazy good! Even gluten free and veggie options were fantastic
